raw_data.reputation_claims_settlement_ratio: Consistent performance; paid Ksh 134M flood claim in 2025 (Sinohydro case); sector-wide claims rose to Ksh 294.9B in H1 2025
raw_data.reputation_customer_complaints: Limited public details; some delays in claims noted on X; positive for affordability and education products
raw_data.reputation_customer_rating: Positive feedback for flexible products and customer service; trusted for 30+ years
raw_data.reputation_notes: Locally owned since 1988; 27 branches; ranked in top 10 insurers for 2025 (Bowman); focuses on education and health innovation

text: Madison Group Limited is a composite (general, life, health, investments) company licensed by Insurance Regulatory Authority (IRA) Kenya under reference IRA/18/006/2025. Headquarters: Madison Insurance House, Upper Hill Close, P.O. Box 41163-00100, Nairobi, Kenya. Website: https://www.madison.co.ke. Customer rating: Positive feedback for flexible products and customer service; trusted for 30+ years, Claims settlement ratio: Consistent performance; paid Ksh 134M flood claim in 2025 (Sinohydro case); sector-wide claims rose to Ksh 294.9B in H1 2025.

text: Marine Insurance (ID: madison_marine_001) is a general / non-life insurance / marine product by madison_001 for importers, exporters, logistics firms. Geographic coverage: Kenya / international (port-to-port).
Exclusions for Marine Insurance (ID: madison_marine_001): ['Inherent vice, improper packing', 'War risks (add-on available)'].
Add-ons for Marine Insurance (ID: madison_marine_001): ['War and strikes'].
Domestic Package (ID: madison_domestic_package_002) is a general / non-life insurance / property product by madison_001 for homeowners, tenants, BnB owners. Geographic coverage: Kenya.
Exclusions for Domestic Package (ID: madison_domestic_package_002): ['Wear/tear, deliberate damage', 'Unoccupied >30 days'].
Add-ons for Domestic Package (ID: madison_domestic_package_002): ['Temporary accommodation'].

Travel Insurance: Safarisure (International Travel Cover) (ID: madison_safarisure_003) is a general / non-life insurance / travel product by madison_001 for international travelers (business/leisure). Geographic coverage: Worldwide (excl. Kenya).
Exclusions for Travel Insurance: Safarisure (International Travel Cover) (ID: madison_safarisure_003): ['Pre-existing conditions', 'War zones, adventure sports'].
Add-ons for Travel Insurance: Safarisure (International Travel Cover) (ID: madison_safarisure_003): ['Gadgets extension'].
